1 ADA equals 0.45 USD. The current value of 1 Cardano is  -2.86% against the
exchange rate to USD in the last 24 hours.​ The current Cardano market cap is
$16.07B. ​Create a free Kraken account to instantly convert ADA to USD today.

## How to convert  
Cardano to United States Dollar

### Create your free  
Kraken account

You can trade ADA on Kraken with as little as $10.

### Connect your  
funding method

Link your card or bank account  
after Kraken verifies your account.

### Convert  
ADA to USD

Choose from cryptocurrencies  
to trade on Kraken.

[Trade now](https://kraken.app.link/C7jtQTPhHFb)

[Trade now](/sign-up)

Advanced trading & crypto portfolio tools

### ADA to USD converter FAQ:

  1. ### What does conversion rate mean?

The Cardano to United States Dollar conversion rate is the amount of United
States Dollar you can receive for each unit of Cardano.

  2. ### What affects the Cardano to United States Dollar conversion rate?

The conversion rate between Cardano and United States Dollar may fluctuate
based on supply and demand, relative scarcity, investor sentiment, media
attention and other factors.

  3. ### How do I use this ADA to USD converter tool?

Enter the amount of Cardano you wish to convert to United States Dollar into
the Cardano field. To convert United States Dollar to Cardano, input the
amount of United States Dollar in the United States Dollar field.

  4. ### How can I convert Cardano to United States Dollar ?

    1. Ensure Cardano and United States Dollar are selected in the converter tool
    2. Enter the amount of Cardano you want to convert into United States Dollar
    3. Click "Trade now" to sign up or sign into your Kraken account
    4. Convert Cardano to United States Dollar with just a few clicks

  5. ### Can I buy ADA with USD?

Yes, this trading pair is available on Kraken.

investment advice or a recommendation or solicitation to buy, sell, stake or
hold any cryptoasset or to engage in any specific trading strategy. Kraken
does not and will not work to increase or decrease the price of any particular
cryptoasset it makes available. Some crypto products and markets are
unregulated, and you may not be protected by government compensation and/or
regulatory protection schemes. The unpredictable nature of the crypto-asset
markets can lead to loss of funds. Tax may be payable on any return and/or on
any increase in the value of your cryptoassets and you should seek independent
advice on your taxation position. Geographic restrictions may apply._
